Name: Tony Stark’s Sakaarian Iron Man
Description: A new dimension of play for Marvel fans!¬Kids can recreate scenes from the animated Disney+ TV series What If...? and explore new stories from the Marvel Universe.¬LEGO® Marvel Tony Stark’s Sakaarian Iron Man¬Posable Sakaarian Iron Man¬Movable limbs bring imaginative role play to life.¬Reconfigurable fun¬Rebuild the Hulkbuster into a race car!¬3 figures to inspire role play¬Play out stories with Valkyrie, Tony Stark and The Watcher.¬A great building experience¬This supercool construction set for Marvel movie fans aged 8+ and up helps to develop kids’ creative and cognitive skills.¬A treat for young action heroes¬The perfect gift for any Marvel fan who enjoys creating new stories with iconic super-hero characters.¬Iconic Marvel minifigures¬This versatile playset puts popular action heroes from Disney+ TV’s What If...? series into young Marvel fans’ hands.¬On slide 1 of 2
